body: Don't scroll further then the one next to me it's a curse comment

Artist of story on pg 87 (the one with dark skin) is Mifune Seijirou. Pg 155 (Succubus story) is Yutakame. Pg 361 (the wife story?) Tanaka Nanataka. LOL I might as well do the rest, so here we go: Pg 3 (shotacon) is Takatsu (the en-TL is here https://nhentai.net/g/345248/ ). Pg 43 (bbw harem) is Momiyama (artist of 'Oppai Switch'). Pg 125 obviously is SINK. Pg 203 is ofc Narushima Godou. Pg 243 is Emine Kendama. Pg 329 is Maccha Neji. Pg 395 is Yamada Shiguma. Only two I could not identify: pg 287 and 439 since the tags for these are missing? And why is Shijima Yukio here (is this the artist for the cover page design)? That's all for now (sry I absolutely know no Japanese, I just based on the names from their respective previous works).

If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. Sorry y'all i got cursed too, you can't underestimate random people curs
